Home Libraries People FAQ More
get_as_radian

get coordinate value of a segment or box, result is in Radian

Description

Result is in Radian, even if source coordinate system is in Degrees

Synopsis 

template<std::size_t Index, std::size_t Dimension, typename Geometry>
fp_coordinate_type<Geometry>::type get_as_radian(Geometry const & geometry)

Parameters

Type

Concept

Name

Description

Index

index

-

Must be specified

Dimension

dimension

-

Must be specified

Geometry const &

geometry

geometry

geometry to get coordinate value from

Returns

coordinate value

Header

Either

#include <boost/geometry.hpp>

Or

#include <boost/geometry/core/radian_access.hpp>
